Regulation Name(s): Culture Media for Pathogenic Neisseria Spp.
Specimen Type(s): Specimen intended for growth of Neisseria species
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for InTray GC culture medium for pathogenic Neisseria gonorrhoeae with transport capability
Indications for Use Summary: Microbiological device intended to differentiate and support the growth of pathogenic Neisseria gonorrhoeae when incubated at 35°C for 24-72 hours, with optional pre-incubation and specimen transport at room temperature up to 72 hours
